Message: That's what drives us to act. I can't tell you the way we're going to intervene, but... You'll see it soon enough.
Possible Answers: When you say that Humanity is running to its doom, what do you mean exactly?
Reactions: I will tell you later. I'm sorry, but I don't have time to give you more information for now.

Message: Besides... I have other bad news.
Thanks to you, the hackers did contact us.
But they very quickly stopped giving news.
We still intend on going forward though.
Possible Answers: What are you planning to do?

Message: We'll infiltrate a building and place a hacking device within it.
